PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07732010-06-17,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectStatistics Canada Census-Related Term Employment Exclusion Approval Order
PrecisSTATISTICS CANADA CENSUS-RELATED TERM EMPLOYMENT EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER, to approve the exclusion of positions in Statistics Canada whose function is solely to provide administrative or management support or to perform data processing duties for the purpose of conducting the population census and the agriculture census and the persons appointed or deployed to those positions on a specified term basis.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0045 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
